description:
Induction Into Authority - MK-Ultra ÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢?ÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢?ÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢?ÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ (Published September 9th 2007)
-------------------------------------------------

To some, the very possibility of controlling someone else\\\&#039;s mind seems 
impossible to consider, but when the moral and ethical restrictions of medicine
and common law are removed, and the impending state of wartime measures 
descends, every possibility is explored and exploited by the state in the
pursuit and preservation of National Security. As Hitler believed, the wars 
of the twentieth century are not fought on the battlefield, but in the minds
of the people. This is more true today than it ever has been in the past.

This compilation deals specifically with the historical evidence and programs
used in the government mind control program known as MK-Ultra. It\\\&#039;s technology 
is often psychological and electronic means of producing of the kind of trauma 
used to brainwash and covertly manipulate unsuspecting human beings. This practice
first began in Nazi Germany, as Hitler sought the ultimate weapon of domination
for the Third Reich. His pursuits included the use of highly devleoped propaganda,
the creation of the youth movement, multi-generational incestuous families, and the
torture of jewish children and social outcasts who were used as test subjects
in medical experiments conducted at Dashau by Dr Josef Mengele.

But the atrocities did not end with the Nuremberg trials and the so-called defeat
of the nazi regime. Under project paperclip, hundreds of Hitlers \\\"Mind Scientists\\\"
were covertly relocated into the USA national security establishment and top Ivy 
League universities. In addition, Hitlers own spymaster and head of intelligence, 
Reinhard Gehlen, was made the head of the US intelligence gathering organization
set up after world war II, and was instrumental in the creation of the National 
Security Act of 1947, giving birth to the CIA and the \\\"Invisible Government\\\".

Since its inception, the national security state has sought, as Hitler did, to 
achieve the ultimate weapon in world domination and military supremacy. During 
the cold war era, military intelligence, covert warfare and black operations 
became the new rules of engagement, and just as common law and ethics were 
subverted under Nazism, so were laws and morality of US government under the
national security act and intelligence establishment. The US government began to 
conduct and resurrect everything Hitler had discovered in his goal of creating
the ultimate technology of military and mental control.

The details and research involved in this subject can be quite traumatizing to
those seeking an understanding of what Mind Control involves. The MK-Ultra program
was first exposed through the freedom of information act. Since then, a 
overwhelming amount of documentation, witness testimony, and political scandals 
have surfaced and brought much of this dark subject to light. This DVD attempts to 
trace the development of the MK-Ultra program, its use over the last 50 years,
and the future of government mind control.

Enjoy, and please freely distribute and copy these files and discs.

---------------------

For maximum compatibility all files have been converted to low bit mp3 or
DivX. There are also some WMV, RA and Mov files which either couldn\\\&#039;t be re-
encoded or were kept intact due to their small size. All photos are in jpg
or bmp format, and most webpages are included in single archive MHT files.
Converting these files ensures compatibility for playback on recommended
electronic media players and set-top DVD/DivX players.

All files included should be considered sub-retail and for education only.



On Publishing ÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢?ÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢?ÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢?ÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢
----------------------

Due to the need for this information, some of these files are distributed
without the direct expressed consent of the original copyright holders.
Most are freely recorded or downloaded from public sources before being
further compiled. In this form they are highly compressed, degraded and
should be considered to be sub-retail, non-commercial files. They were
created for personal reference and educational use only.

I would encourage everyone to make their own compilations and to copy,
publish and distribute them freely. Make induction your own.

The Induction Series is published through the Conspiracy Central Tracker
and as such it follows ConCen\\\&#039;s policy of removing content at the original
copyright holders request.
